statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT entry_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = false ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT entry_id, user_id, transaction_amount, is_fraud FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(entry_id) > 5
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS highest_transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection
SELECT entry_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC, transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM fraud_entries
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_entries WHERE is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT entry_date, customer_id FROM fraud_entries ORDER BY entry_date DESC
SELECT entry_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_entries WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE fraud_type = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM fraud_entries WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT entry_date, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_entries WHERE entry_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM fraud_entries WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT pattern_description, fraud_type FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_entries JOIN fraud_patterns ON fraud_entries.customer_id = fraud_patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_data
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT id, username, email FROM fraud_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, alert_message, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_data ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT fdd.user_id, fdd.transaction_amount, fu.username FROM fraud_detection_data fdd JOIN fraud_users fu ON fdd.user_id = fu.user_id
SELECT fa.alert_id, fu.username, fa.alert_message FROM fraud_alerts fa JOIN fraud_users fu ON fa.user_id = fu.user_id
SELECT fa.alert_id, fu.username, fa.alert_message, fa.alert_date FROM fraud_alerts fa JOIN fraud_users fu ON fa.user_id = fu.user_id WHERE fa.alert_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM fraud_detection_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM fraud_detection_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, email FROM fraud_detection_users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM fraud_detection_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trans_id, amount, suspicious_reason FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY trans_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE 'B%';
SELECT pattern_id, description, pattern_source FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_source = 'Online' ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT suspicious_description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE suspicious_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, f.flag_reason FROM transactions t JOIN flagged_transactions f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_message, a.alert_date, c.customer_name FROM alerts a JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT s.suspicious_id, s.suspicious_description, s.suspicious_date, c.customer_name FROM suspicious_activity s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id;
